_meta.description: Domain gates - hard blocks requiring verified domain experience
_meta.doc: Postings matching these patterns are BLOCKED unless profile.domains includes match
_meta.source: Based on Nate's German regulated professions research (2026-01-28)
_meta.philosophy: Only gate professions where unlicensed practice is ILLEGAL, not just regulated

healthcare.rationale: Practicing medicine without licence is criminal (StGB §132a, Heilpraktikergesetz)

legal.rationale: Unauthorized legal practice is criminal (RDG §3, BRAO)

education_teaching.rationale: State school teaching requires Staatsexamen (DE) or QTS (UK)

childcare.rationale: Erzieher in DE requires state certification (regulated profession)

aviation_crew.rationale: Flying commercial aircraft without licence is criminal

technical_health_trades.rationale: HwO Anlage A trades impacting health - soft gate with warning

severity_levels.hard: Block match entirely unless profile domain matches
severity_levels.soft: Show match but add certification warning in results

_not_gated.accounting: CPA/Steuerberater - regulated but not criminal to work in accounting without certification
_not_gated.financial_intermediary: §34d/f/h require permits for RUNNING business, not for employment
_not_gated.security_guarding: §34a Sachkunde required but violation is administrative, not criminal
_not_gated.construction_trades: Meisterpflicht for business ownership, Gesellen can work without
_not_gated.architecture: Title protected but can work in architecture firms without Kammer membership
_not_gated.engineering: Not title-protected in most German states
